message: Automate commit history and metadata updates via git pre-commit hook
Regenerate full manuscripts and sync thematic/terminological divergence
Update INDEX.md with 5 parts and regenerate manuscripts
feat: unify YA and 13+ drafts into chapter files and generate aggregated manuscripts
v0.10.42: Update assembly script to exclusive prose (Draft) extraction
v0.10.40: Refactor chapters to 34 count, synchronize metadata, and humanize Lem's voice
Consolidate manuscript drafts and chapter plans into single files in ff-story/chapters
Correct chapter numbering to match the new 34-chapter structure
Renumber chapter plans and update INDEX.md
Add Chapter 9: The Reincarnation, renumber subsequent chapters, and format Chapter 10 as a numbered list
Update manuscript assembly script to pull version from VERSION file
Update Novak's weapon to clunky experimental launcher in Chapters 3, 6, and 8
Refine Lem voice: Remove explicit mentions of noting facts or keeping mental records
Refine Chapter 4: Soften crewman failure and bridge reaction
Refine Lem voice: Remove internal recorder-speak from all but first and last chapters
Refine Lem voice: Remove robotic phrasing and adopt a more human, grounded tone
Refactor story beginning: Add years-long Alien Moon Base buildup, split Chapter 1, refine Lem voice
Update Lem's 'Emotional Journey' to match his observant and fearless nature
Rewrite Chapter 2 line 18 to reflect Lem'\''s observant and fearless nature
Refine terminology in Chapter 2 revision notes
